LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Caretta.label: Caretta
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Caretta.description: mobile artillery platform equipped with a rapid fire mortar launcher, designed to bombardment enemy base and ground forces from afar.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Caretta.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Geochelone.label: geochelone
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Geochelone.description: an unmanned all-terrain tracked pulse shield support platform, featuring a diverse range of production models and variants.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Geochelone.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Geochelone.comps.CompMultipleTu: Toggle turret to manual control mode to prevent unnecessary shooting.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Geochelone_b.label: geochelone
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Geochelone_b.description: an unmanned all-terrain tracked pulse shield support platform, featuring a diverse range of production models and variants.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Geochelone_b.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Killdozer.label: killdozer
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Killdozer.description: An unmanned assault sapper with a dozer blade for fortification breakthrough in the frontline, and the armor on various parts of the body has also been strengthened.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Killdozer_b.label: killdozer
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Killdozer_b.description: An unmanned assault sapper with a dozer blade for fortification breakthrough in the frontline, and the armor on various parts of the body has also been strengthened.
